content.14/f Haley 2000/z winter/t 1000 1600/w s: spring_day_ambient/100 23/farmer 94 23 1 Haley 100 23 1/skippable/pause 2000/showFrame Haley 25/pause 500/playSound cameraNoise/shake Haley 50/screenFlash .5/pause 800/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 2 true/showFrame Haley 24/pause 500/playSound cameraNoise/shake Haley 50/screenFlash .5/move farmer 5 0 1 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Haley 3 true/showFrame Haley 27/pause 400/jump Haley/pause 600/showFrame Haley 12/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 300/speak Haley "噢！ @。$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 800/speak Haley "陽光真好……我出來拍拍照片。"/pause 600/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 600/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 400/speak Haley "我想多出門走走……#$b#我想知道農民生活是什麼樣的。我從沒想過這樣的生活。#$b#直到現在……$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 800/speak Haley "呵呵，這些乳牛好可愛……"/pause 600/emote Haley 16/faceDirection Haley 3/speak Haley "嘿，我有個主意！$h"/move Haley 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound sandyStep/addBigProp 100 25 106/pause 600/move Haley 0 -1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Haley "我們跟這些乳牛合張影吧！你教教我怎麼接近乳牛！$h#$b#我會設置好定時器。"/move Haley 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/playSound openBox/move Haley 0 -1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Haley 0/playMusic 50s/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/cutscene haleyCows/pause 2000/speak Haley "哞……$9"/pause 1000/speak Haley "* 咯咯 *$10#$b#太好玩了 @!這些照片也很滑稽！$10"/pause 500/speak Haley "我現在想要回家洗個澡……$10"/pause 1000/mail haleyGarden/end dialogue Haley "我從來沒有這麼髒過。$h"

farmer 3/pause 500/speak Leah "你比看起來還要強壯！$h"/pause 1000/speak Leah "給，嚐一塊……"/pause 300/farmerEat 613/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/viewport move -1 1 6000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Leah "我剛想起來一件事。#$b#就算我的藝術生涯以失敗告終，也總會有朋友在我跌落谷底的過程中撈我一把。$h"/pause 1000/end dialogue Leah "謝謝你之前的幫助……$h"
content.54/f Leah 2500/t 1100 1600/z winter: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 87 40 3 Leah 76 40 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite leahPicnic/viewport 77 40 true/move farmer -10 0 3/speak Leah "嗨，@。我知道你今天會從這路過。#$b#……所以我準備了個驚喜……$h"/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 800/speak Leah "一起小小地野餐一頓吧！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "這是蔬菜雜燴，用我“特製”的調味品調製的。"/pause 600/move Leah -1 0 0/speak Leah "……這是新鮮的沙拉，用的是我從這座森林裡採來的蔬菜！$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Leah 1/move farmer -1 0 3/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 1200/speak Leah "@，呃……$l"/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "我想謝謝你……幫助我距離成為真正的藝術家又近了一步。$l"/pause 400/showFrame Leah 25/pause 100/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/animate farmer true true 100 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite heart 76 39/pause 1000/stopMusic/message "遙遠的聲音：哎呀哎呀哎呀……看看誰來了？"/warp LeahEx 74 29/move LeahEx 0 9 2 true/stopAnimation farmer/positionOffset farmer -16 0/faceDirection farmer 0 true/showFrame Leah 4/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 4000/showFrame LeahEx 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speak Leah "凱爾？？$6#$b#你怎麼在這裡？$a"/fork LeahInternet choseInternet/message "凱爾：你在藝術展上沒看見我嗎？我大老遠從祖祖城跑來看你的雕像。"/move LeahEx 0 1 2/message "凱爾：還有讓你和我一起回去。"/message "凱爾：我想回到從前……我想你，寶貝。"/emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "呸，少肉麻！$a#$b#你以前從來不支持我的藝術……現在我成功了，你就浪子回頭了？真噁心。$a"/move Leah 0 2 2/showFrame LeahEx 4/message "凱爾：嘿！過來！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer -2 0 0 false/question fork1 "#朝凱爾臉上打一拳。#去跟凱爾講道理。"/fork noPunch/pause 300/screenFlash .25/animate farmer false false 650 15/positionOffset farmer 0 -8/faceDirection Leah 0 true/playSound clubhit/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/speak Leah "我的天啊！$6"/speed Leah 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -4 1/emote Leah 40/pause 1700/speak Leah "他沒事的……但還真是暴力。 @。^她沒事的……但還真是暴力。 @。"/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "我們走吧凱爾不會再打擾我們了。"/speed farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -8 0 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "這次找個更僻靜的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "這次的野餐沒按我預想的那樣進行下去。$h"
content.choseInternet: pause 10/message "凱爾：我找到了你的網路上藝術商店……你就不好奇一直買你雕像的“K先生”嗎？"/pause 90/speak Leah "你就是“K先生”？我……我以為就是以為喜歡我的藝術的富豪呢。$s"/move LeahEx 0 1 2/message "凱爾：嘿嘿。你猜對了一半……"/pause 1000/message "凱爾：莉亞，我想讓你回到我身邊。我想你，寶貝。"/emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "咦，少肉麻了！$a#$b#你以前從來不支持我的藝術……現在我成功了，你就浪子回頭了？真噁心。$a"/move Leah 0 2 2/showFrame LeahEx 4/message "凱爾：嘿！過來！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer -2 0 0 false/question fork1 "#朝凱爾臉上打一拳。#和凱爾理論。"/fork noPunch/pause 300/screenFlash .25/animate farmer false false 650 15/positionOffset farmer 0 -8/faceDirection Leah 0 true/playSound clubhit/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/speak Leah "我的天啊！$6"/speed Leah 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -4 1/emote Leah 40/pause 1700/speak Leah "他沒事的……但還真是暴力。 @。^她沒事的……但還真是暴力。 @。"/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "我們走吧。凱爾不會再打擾我們了。"/speed farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -8 0 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "這次找個更僻靜的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "這次的野餐沒按我預想的那樣進行下去。$h"
content.noPunch: pause 10/message "凱爾：我跟你沒什麼好說的。給我滾開。"/speed farmer 2/move farmer 1 0 3/move LeahEx 0 2 2/message "凱爾：說真的，莉亞……你和這個頭腦簡單的鄉巴佬在這裡幹什麼呢？"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Leah 26/pause 1000/showFrame Leah 27/showFrame 94/playSound clubhit/screenFlash .25/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/stopAnimation farmer/speak Leah "@的各個方面都比你強多了！ $a^@從各方面來看都比你優秀得多！$a#$b#你趕緊滾吧，不要再回來了！$a"/move Leah -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -4 1/speak Leah "走吧。@。凱爾不會再打擾我們了。"/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Leah 2 true/move farmer -2 0 0/move Leah 0 -11 0 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "這次找個更僻靜的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "這次的野餐沒按我預想的那樣進行下去。$h"
content.181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 75 40 2 Penny 71 45 2 Jas 71 49 3 Vincent 70 49 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/positionOffset Penny 0 -16/animate Jas false true 90 16 17 18 19/viewport 71 45 true/move farmer 0 5 3/pause 600/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 600/speak Penny "@！你來得正好。"/emote farmer 8/speak Penny "我要帶孩子們去郊外農場進行一次小小的郊遊。#$b#你對鄉下生活很了解吧？$h"/speak Penny "$q -1 null#所以我就想……今天你能當我們的客座解說員嗎？#$r -1 10 event_speaker_yes#我很樂意。#$r -1 0 event_speaker_yes#當然。#$r -1 -1500 event_speaker_no#不……我受不了小孩。"/fork eventEnd/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Penny 26/pause 500/shake Penny 500/speak Penny "賈斯！文森特！聽我說！"/pause 80/stopAnimation Jas/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection Vincent 0/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/speed Jas 4/move Vincent 0 -3 0 true/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "我要為你們介紹一位特殊的嘉賓……我們當地的農夫。 @。#$b#他對農村生活有著切身的體會……他知道谷里所有的“自然資源”！^她對農村生活有著切身的體會……她知道谷里所有的“自然資源”！"/pause 500/speak Penny "有人能告訴我什麼是“自然資源”嗎？"/animate Jas false true 50 20 21/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 1200/speak Penny "賈斯？"/stopAnimation Vincent/stopAnimation Jas/speak Jas "自然資源就是在自然狀態下演化形成的物質資源儲藏，有經濟價值。$4"/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Penny "很好！這個回答可以給兩顆星，賈斯。"/speak Jas "好耶！$h"/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Penny "那麼，我們有請 @講話。"/move Penny -1 0 1/move farmer -4 0 2/question fork0 "#鄉村生活的全部就是耕種。#鄉村生活的全部就是從大自然獲得饋贈。"/fork choseFarming/pause 500/question fork0 "#這座山谷充滿了珍貴的礦物。#這裡的水域裡生長著許許多多新鮮的海鮮。#你在格蘭普立頓南部找不出比這裡更好的木材。"/fork choseMinerals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@先生，你會娶潘妮老師嗎？$s^@女士……呃，你有男朋友嗎？"/speak Penny "文森特！這問題太無禮了！注意你自己的言行，不然我就收回你今天所有的星星。$a"/emote Vincent 28/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.choseFarming: pause 500/question fork0 "#山谷的土壤非常適合種植蔬菜。#山谷的空氣和青草很適合放牧。"/fork choseAnimals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "呃，@？如果我吃了你的蔬菜，我會長得像我哥哥山姆一樣壯嗎？#$b#他好好壯啊，昨晚他和潘妮老師爬樹的時候，把她整個舉起來了呢。$h"/showFrame Penny 27/jump Penny/pause 800/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote Penny 12/speak Penny "文森特！別亂講！$a"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd/
content.choseAnimals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？我能在您的乳牛身上套一個鞍然後騎著它到鎮裡嗎？我想成為真正的牛仔！"/speak Penny "文森特！注意自己的言行！@先生要靠農場為生呢！這可不是玩的地方$h^文森特！注意自己的言行！@小姐要靠農場為生呢！這可不是玩的地方。$h"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.choseMinerals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？山洞真的住著哥布林嗎……它們真的會吃小孩嗎？"/jump Jas/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 28/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/speak Penny "文森特！你嚇到賈斯了。我們別聊怪物的事情了。$a"/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection Jas 0/emote Penny 12/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.fieldTripEnd: pause 400/emote Penny 40/speak Penny "嗯，今天差不多就這樣吧。你倆去玩吧。"/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 9 0 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/jump Vincent/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 3 1 false/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 9 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "照顧這些孩子很累……$u#$b#但我不介意。我喜歡看著他們學習……我也希望能幫他們成長為優秀的人。"/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "$q -1 null#你想過要孩子嗎， @?#$r -1 0 event_speaker_kids1#我還沒認真想過。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids2#那當然，我想要很多孩子。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids3#有吧，這是人的本能願望。#$r -1 10 event_speaker_kids4#沒有，我覺得我不適合。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids5#不想，這個世界的人已經夠多了。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids6#不想，我不想被家庭束縛。"/viewport move 1 0 10000/pause 7000/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Penny "那好吧，我很高興你能來， @。孩子們玩得很開心。$h"/end dialogue Penny "謝謝你讓我們度過了一個有意義的郊遊。"
content.eventEnd: faceDirection Penny 3/emote Penny 12/end dialogue Penny "真不敢相信你居然拒絕了我的請求。$a"
content.318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat: communityCenter/94 99/farmer 98 88 2 Jas 95 100 3 Vincent 93 100 1/playMusic communityCenter/skippable/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 1000/speak Jas "呃……好難聞。$s"/pause 600/jump Vincent/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 0/pause 500/showFrame Vincent 16/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/showFrame Vincent 8/speak Vincent "……$s#$b#怎麼鎖上了？我還想去下水道裡探索一番呢！$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 800/speak Jas "鑰匙應該在岡瑟手裡。"/pause 300/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Vincent "岡瑟教授？開博物館的那個？你為什麼會覺得鑰匙在他手裡？$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "有一次，我見到一把生鏽的大鑰匙從他的口袋裡掉了出來。#$b#這種嚇人的下水道大門一定得配一把生鏽的舊鑰匙。$4"/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/emote Vincent 8 true/emote Jas 8 true/pause 900/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/shake Vincent 5000/shake Jas 5000/jump Jas/jump Vincent/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 false/pause 1500/playSound shadowDie/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 6/speed Jas 6/advancedMove Jas false 4 0 0 -7 -1 0/advancedMove Vincent false 6 0 0 -8 -1 0/proceedPosition Vincent 98 92/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/speak Jas "裡面有東西在動！$u"/shake Jas 4000/shake Vincent 4000/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 6 3 false/move farmer -4 0 0/pause 800/emote farmer 40/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/faceDirection farmer 2 true/jump farmer/showFrame 94/jump Vincent/jump Jas/speed Jas 4/speed Vincent 4/move Jas 0 -6 0 true/move Vincent 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.611944/f Shane 500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2/skippable/addLantern 735 35 25 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 34 25 true/move farmer 0 7 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "已經很晚了蛤？"/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 1000/speak Shane "給，來杯涼的。"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame 90/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 5000/showFrame Shane 20/speak Shane "生活啊。"/playMusic echos/pause 4000/speak Shane "你有沒有這種感覺……無論你做什麼都會失敗？#$b#就好像你陷入痛苦的深淵無法自拔，看不到一點光芒？"/pause 2000/speak Shane "我感覺不管我多努力……我都無法強大到從那個洞裡爬出來。"/pause 3000/farmerEat 346/pause 4000/speak Shane "喝挺快啊？是個我欣賞的漢子。^喝挺快啊？是個我欣賞的姑娘。#$b#不過別上癮了……你還有大好年華呢。"/pause 3000/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 19/speak Shane "哎喲……我的肝已經給我發警報了。那就晚安了。#$b#待會見。 @。"/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.3910975/f Shane 1500/e 3910674/t 900 200: echos/-2000 -2000/farmer 83 92 2 Shane -3000 -3000 2 Harvey -3000 -3000 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite shaneCliffs/viewport 83 99 clamp true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 5 2/pause 500/speak Shane "……$7#$b#@……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "對……對不起……*打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我……我的人生……$7#$b#是個可悲的笑話……$7#$b#看著我……$7#$b#……$7#$b#我為什麼要掙扎呢？ ……*抽咽*$7#$b#我根本掌控不了自己的人生……$7#$b#我只是……風中搖曳的一片垃圾…… *打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我最近經常來這裡……往下看……$7#$b#這是控制我人生的最後一個機會…… 這些懸崖……$7#$b#……$7#$b#但…… 但…… *打嗝*…… 但是我太害怕，太焦慮。就像平時一樣…… $7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 2000/speak Shane "@…… 我的人生就是工作，睡覺，吃喝……到…… 到自我仇恨的沮喪心情。$7#$b#為什麼我還要繼續？ 告訴我…… 告…… 告訴我為什麼我不應該現在馬上從懸崖邊上滾下去……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 1000/question shaneCliffs "#因為有太多的留戀！#賈斯需要你。你就像她的父親。#因為這會是一種罪惡。#這是你自己的決定。我只知道為了你我會一直在這裡。"/pause 500/pause 500/pause 500/pause 1000/speak Shane "@……$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "……我想你應該帶我去醫院了。$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 0/jump farmer/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/changeLocation Hospital/warp farmer 16 7/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/warp Harvey 16 6/faceDirection farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite shaneHospital/viewport 16 6 true/pause 2000/speak Harvey "……我已經幫他清洗過胃部並且對他身體進行了再水化。他會好起來的。#$b#總之，慶幸你及時把他送到醫院。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/emote Harvey 28/speak Harvey "酒精太多會對身體造成很大負擔…… 但是現在我最擔心的是他的心理健康……$s#$b#當他醒來時，我會和他聊聊關於他的治療方案。我認識祖祖城的一個優秀心理學家……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Harvey "有時，生活會很痛苦…#$b#但是未來總是充滿美好和希望的。你得學會相信它。"/pause 2000/end invisible Shane

48/viewport 72 39 true/pause 6000/emote Marnie 28/speak Marnie "唔……利亞？還要多久？$s#$b#……我的膝蓋在顫抖，我的大腿在哭泣，我的腳已經失去了知覺。 $s"/shake Marnie 500/pause 1000/shake Marnie 500/speak Leah "只要保持完全靜止就好，瑪妮……不要動！$h"/emote Marnie 28/speak Leah "嘿，@……你覺得我應該畫什麼風格？我什麼都行……"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #傳統鄉村肖像#多彩的復古流行藝術#極簡主義現代風(break)speak Leah "保持傳統風格是嗎？好的，我想瑪妮會喜歡的。"\addWorldState m_painting0(break)speak Leah "好主意！聽起來很有趣……讓我在調色板上再加一些黃色的顏料……"\addWorldState m_painting1(break)speak Leah "嗯……不是我通常的風格，但我可以試試。我最好換一個丙烯顏料……"\addWorldState m_painting2/pause 500/speak Leah "你的怎麼樣了？"/quickQuestion #完全就是傑作！#我還在盡力畫……#看起來像狗爬一樣(break)speak Leah "哇，我喜歡你的自信！$h#$b#誰說得准呢？也許你就是下一個盧皮尼呢！$h#$b#……我都等不及要看了。"(break)speak Leah "嘿，這就是我要的。如果你盡力去做，自然就會越來越擅長！"(break)speak Leah "嘿，沒關係的！萬事起頭難。而且你永遠都說不定，你的狗爬，對另一個人來說可能就是“現代藝術”。"/pause 500/textAboveHead Marnie "把我畫得漂亮一點！"/pause 1500/textAboveHead Leah "噓！"/pause 2300/speak Leah "好了，別忘了我教你的技巧……線條要粗，這樣握畫筆……"/pause 1000/playSound "呃……@，要不你把自己的畫留下來吧？把自己的第一幅畫收藏起來，呃……很棒的……是吧？$s"/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize marniePainting/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Leah "嗯……親愛的？你原本打算把你畫的那幅畫掛在哪？$3"
